marklogic.body:
Here's my take...
Eveland- Passes through waivers to AAA, wouldn't be a big loss anyway. Tillman- Norfolk bound, he has more value to the club as a starter then reliever. Phillips- Norfolk, he'll be one of the first back on the major league club. Simon- Would NOT make it through waivers, either trade him or DL. Strop- Would NOT make it through waivers, he makes the team. Patton- Also wouldn't make it through waivers, makes the team. O'Day- Tough call, hope he isn't the odd man out because of Gregg. Wada- They can be flexible with him, extended spring, Norfolk, DL, or 5th rotation Spot. Matusz- on what happens with Wada, probably makes the club though.
I really wish they would just dump Gregg. It seems like he would be one of those players that would Bounce back really well though after getting cut. Also I believe this is a contract year for him so i suppose the motivation is there... Regardless, he stinks now, and he stunk all last year.
